document.docAuthor: Nguyen, Tung T., Nguyen, Anh D., Tran, Binh T. T. & Blakemore, Robert J.
document.masterDocTitle: A comprehensive checklist of earthworm species and subspecies from Vietnam (Annelida: Clitellata: Oligochaeta: Almidae, Eudrilidae, Glossoscolecidae, Lumbricidae, Megascolecidae, Moniligastridae, Ocnerodrilidae, Octochaetidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A comprehensive checklist of earthworm species and subspecies from Vietnam (Annelida: Clitellata: Oligochaeta: Almidae, Eudrilidae, Glossoscolecidae, Lumbricidae, Megascolecidae, Moniligastridae, Ocnerodrilidae, Octochaetidae)

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type material.
In the collection of Oxford University Museum , England .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Examined material.
6 C ( SORC-V.241.2 ) Quang Binh Prov., Bo Trach Distr. , Tan Trach commune,
18/05/ 1991
, coll. Nguyen Van Thuan
;
1 C ( SORC-V.241.6 ) Quang Binh Prov., Tuyen Hoa Distr. , Mai Hoa commune, tea planted hill,
20 August 1991
, coll. Nguyen Duc Tan
;
1 C ( SORC-V.241.3 ) Quang Nam Prov., Nui Thanh Distr. , Ky Ha ,
24 January 1989
, coll. Pham Thi Hong Ha
;
1 C, 1 A ( SORC-V.241.6 ) Quang Ngai Prov., garden,
30 November 1994
, coll. Cao Van Sung
;
3 C ( CTU-W.027.01 ) Vinh Long Prov., Vung Liem Distr. , Trung Thanh commune,
9 November 2008
, coll. Nguyen Thi Nhi
.

Remarks. The species has been recorded from various parts of the world ( India ,
Sri Lanka
, Seychelles , Brazil , Hawaii , Madagascar , Fiji , Australia , Southeast Asia,
Papua New Guinea
) ( Blakemore 2002 ). However, its homeland is still unknown. The species possibly originated in Southeast Asia ( Easton 1979 ) or in
Papua New Guinea
( Gates 1972 ).
